TopicTitle: Rover behaves like the Magic school bus

Articles.Content:
https://www.xbox.com/play/media/CYBU4RE3
 

The video ain’t uploading, but that rover rocks side to side while driving and parked. I think it’s something with the wheels, but I don’t know.
The drive limiters are turned down and the traction control is turned to 3 if that helps.

Field trip!

Check the dampers and the springs. They are found under advanced tweakables. 

<obvious pun>
Carlos!

I knew I should have stayed home.

Wahahoo!
